game.name: 100 Little Monsters
game.description:
Hey! Do you think that you are capable enough to capture the monsters in the moving cups? If you are nodding your heads up-and-down for yes, then 100 Little Monsters is just for you. Your objective in this latest HTML5 arcade game is to dump these razor-toothed terrors into moving containers to crate points. It sounds easy to play, but master requires a lot of skill and patience. Let us see how beautifully you control the monster dispenser. 

Keep dumping until you run out of monsters in this cool puzzle mobile phone! Make sure that you dump a horde of few monsters in each jar that comes at the bottom after moving. Your jar will keep disappearing from the screen if you fail in dumping even a single monster in it. Work hard and pay attention to your focus skills to fill up your jars with the maximum number of monsters to score high points! The change of jar will keep changing that also affects the colour of monsters.

Be ready and click or tap the screen to drop the monsters when the moving jar is lined up under the nozzle in this point and click game! Your performance will depend upon the number of recycling the monsters. Earn coins after levelling up and use them to upgrade your game then! The more you loot the better you will be able to earn and unlock new levels. Your timing and accuracy skills will be tested in this challenging and addictive puzzle game.
